message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_REMOVED
message.locale: Cannot approve as the appealed case has been removed from the appeal.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_REJECTED
message.locale: Cannot approve as the appealed case has been rejected.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_APPROVED
message.locale: Cannot approve as the appealed case has already been approved.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_XRV_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Cannot approve as the appealed case has not been submitted for approval.
